page.title: 18Industry Robert Jenkins Ltd
page.content: Robert Jenkins steel works was built in 1855. They make dished and flanged heads to finish off other products. They make 4 inch to 16 feet dishes for going on top of gas canisters. They put on a special coating of sulphuric acid and zinc to stop metal corroding. They employ 300 people. 30 of these are women. In certain departments they wear special clothes. In the office they wear a uniform. On the shop floor they have 2 eight hour shifts. In the office they work 9.00 a.m. to 5.00 p.m. They say the wages are good for the area. They think the future will be very good for them.
